lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I like to think that these loans help impact the quality of life for people who need a hand up.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: provide opportunities
lender.occupational_info: volunteer

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to be successful!
lender.occupational_info: I help hospitals improve their business processes so they can better serve their patients and communities.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I love to see people succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I write software!

lender.name: Layne
lender.loan_because: It is a fantastic way to help, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to grow and their organizations to excel.

lender.name: Ryan & Kristin
lender.loan_because: We have some to give to those that don't.
lender.occupational_info: We give medical care to animals in need.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I am the daughter of a teacher mother and an entrepreneur father. I taught elementary school (kids ages ranging from 6-11) for 21 years. I am also an author. Due to health issues, I retired at age 50.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I see it as my responsibility to help my fellow man. And what cooler way is there than this?
lender.occupational_info: Well, I am a 17 year old High School student. I will be graduating next year and going to college. Basically I love the idea of global technology like this being used to do so much good.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I was born into a fortunate situation & there is no better feeling than helping those who are less fortunate when I have the opportunity to do so.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I live in a country that has given me opportunities than not everyone gets and the ability to touch people's lives with just a little bit of help is something I enjoy. I believe people in the world are willing to work to improve their own circumstances and giving people a handout does more harm than good. Kiva provides people with the help they need without stripping them of the dignity that comes from making your own success. I love this program.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer systems that allow hospitals to provide better care for patients. Hospitals have become very complex with a lot of information being generated about someone's health. The computer systems allow us to use that information to make sure that we catch problems that people could sometimes miss and prevent waste that increases cost. It's using computers to allow people to live happier and healthier lives.

lender.name: stephaine
lender.occupational_info: I have a passion for doing hair when i doing hair, im in a zone i've been doing hair since i was 12 years old. All the work ive done as years go by an i continue doing hair i become more an more better to become something i desire to be.

lender.name: ricardo
lender.loan_because: tenho 2 filhos e estou desempregado quero abrir um negocio epreciso de 5000€ mas nao ha nehum banco que me empreste.estou desesperado......

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand sometimes.

lender.name: Carlos Hugo Caseiro Tavares de Freitas
Talia
lender.occupational_info: Web Development, Design, Photography, Videography, Public Relations, Electronic Media, Business Development, Advertising (Concepts, Print, Electronic, Television). at TH Design & Photography, Falcon Geodetic Ltd., White Buffalo,; Student at University of Reno-Nevada Reno, Nevada

lender.name: J Fields
lender.loan_because: I would like to help empower others that have the desire, drive and need to improve the situation they are in, yet they may not always have the means to do so.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help make schools more energy efficient using traditional and renewable technologies!

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It's fun and I feel like I can relate to the entrepreneurial spirit that the borrowers have: I have what I believe are some great ideas that I wish could be funded. Most of the people we lend to have great ideas might make the world better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm married to Melody Martin. We invented Animal Herders the card game together. It's still only a prototype, but I guess if we get enough support from people on Kiva we might go forward, get a Kiva loan, and release the game to the general public.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am a social justice oriented individual who wants to afford opportunity to those around the world who would otherwise not have it.
lender.occupational_info: I audit individuals and businesses to ensure compliance with current U.S. tax law.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: Love is my religion
lender.occupational_info: I operate my own English teaching business in South Korea.

lender.name: ApexEnergySolutions
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel there is an obligation to assist others who need just a little help in getting started. While we help improve the comfort level and overall quality of life of those with whom we do business, we nevertheless feel it is important to help make a difference in the lives of those outside the scope of our normal business activities.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Josh and Chuck said it would save my soul.

lender.name: Craig R.
lender.loan_because: I am successful with my business, and am in a position to help others become successful as well.
lender.occupational_info: I cut and color hair.

lender.name: Ashlie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people better their lives and live their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: As an Actress I get to play pretend for the entertainment of other people. As a designer I channel my creativity into clothing form as a means of expression. And as a blogger I write whatever I want about when ever I want to.

lender.name: Brittany
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to make sure your money goes directly to a project of your choice

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and capacity for making a change. It's a global community and if progress is going to happen, we need to provide the resources so people can get on their feet.
lender.occupational_info: I work with street children in Mumbai to help them learn a career and earn a job placement to get off of the streets and become independent.

lender.name: Elise
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university and do research on issues related to sexuality.

lender.name: Janie
lender.loan_because: Being self sufficient as a woman is what has kept me proud of myself, beyond raising my children. Being a mother is different than running your own business. I am very happy to have the shance to support KIVA and the many women that benefit.
lender.occupational_info: Taking pictures of kids, from birth through seniors, is the love of my life. I enjoy finding the KID in all people. My speciality is babies and children. They remind us how to stay young. You can see it in their eyes. I am fortunate to have this talent.

lender.name: Sven
lender.loan_because: I'm convinced, micro credits are the best way to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Bjørn
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do. And I find it useful to help people who are creative.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I hope that my teensy weensy loans to entrepreneurs in developing countries will contribute towards sustainably improving lives and creating employment.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles and web content. My novel is still work in progress :)

lender.name: Family Feliks
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Tommaso
lender.loan_because: I loan because a small money for me can be a real value for others.

lender.name: Mike Chamber
lender.loan_because: Because its profitable in terms of risk/feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I look at numbers and indentify, qualify and quantify risks.

lender.name: René
lender.loan_because: indifference is a crime

lender.name: eugenio
lender.loan_because: I'm happy when i receive back my loan... is because my big family is able to work and live :

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity and to live comfortably. We are all equal
lender.occupational_info: We package and distribute mail.

lender.name: marijke
lender.loan_because: the micro-credit approach works well to contribute to realising people's aspirations and increasing their self-sufficiency

lender.name: Tanja
lender.loan_because: I travel around the world and meet wonderful people everywhere

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Matteo
lender.loan_because: I can give my small support to the people that need it. I have to do it. I hope that one day the world can change with a projects like Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an independent editor, a freelancer journalist and a traveller.

lender.name: Margarita Salasyuk
lender.loan_because: I believe access to capital is an important step in economic development around the world.

lender.name: Loi & Kai
lender.loan_because: Raising my son alone has been challenging financially, so I understand what it feels like to need a loan. :) I want my son to understand that we do whatever we can to help someone else, by sharing our resources and love.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother to a wonderful 7 year old son, Kai. I teach high school and at 2 universities. I'm also a lawyer.

lender.name: Etta
lender.loan_because: Think it's a great idea - a hand up instead of a hand out. And I need the Karma.
lender.occupational_info: I work to live, not live to work.

lender.name: Walker
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I study in my school to go to university.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because:
I have 25 years and a son of 3 years, live with my wife (pictured) in a rented house in Portimao, Portugal.
At the moment I find myself in a job where they earned less and have some bills to pay. As of May can pay the bills because I got a very good offer of work, but I am in a supermarket where I only get € 450 a month and I can not afford the bills. Please help me.
lender.occupational_info: Work in Intermarché of Portimão, Portugal. In my section Take Away, I grill, but also work in the kitchen.

lender.name: Chiwei
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people in need and make a sensible investment at the same time!
lender.occupational_info: I write music for all kinds of singers, instruments, choirs, and ensembles. I also perform frequently as a conductor and a singer.

lender.name: filipe
lender.loan_because: gostaria de montar a minha propria empresa mas fora da pesca porque a pesca está muito mau.agradecia a voça ajuda .obrigado
lender.occupational_info: onesto, lutador , ambiçioso sempre pronto a ajudar.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Muhamad Karkari
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to call Canada my home, and to raise my daughters here with a wonderful Nicaraguan wife. It is important for our children to learn, understand, and practice that meaningfully helping others is our individual responsibility commanded by God, no matter how much or how little one possesses. I care to assist and encourage others in helping themselves and their loved ones, entrepreneurially and personally.
lender.occupational_info: I am a government worker of little importance. I help with the transfer of information and knowledge. My life is best defined by my family, the inspiration for my greatest challenges and my greatest joy.

lender.name: chelsea
lender.loan_because: I believe every small action can make a big difference and hope that societies can find peace through self-sufficiency.

lender.name: Mona
lender.loan_because: it's a virtuous cycle.
lender.occupational_info: Long, tiring and not always rewarding hours in a biochemistry lab. But the vast exposure to science somehow makes it worth it =) And the students I teach make it a lot more exciting!

lender.name: tom
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of sharing my good fortune with people around the world

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It's simple to do and can make a big impact for someone. I like the personal touch rather than just making a donation to some large organization.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a museum and talk to people who visit. We try to learn from the visitors so we can make the museum better for everyone.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: Access to financial support is so important.
lender.occupational_info: Educating people on how the business sector looks at how the entrepreneur is financially responsible as well as proactive in their business

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy teaching English, reading and writing skills to 12 and 13 year olds. I am lucky to spend my day with young people.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I like feeling that I am helping people help themselves. Plus, it is fun to think about what people are doing with the money I lend.
lender.occupational_info: I read a ton and then I write about it.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel great to help others.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of micro loans. A fair way to help.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: Jesus saved me and therefore I'm deeply grateful. I'm blessed with wealth. He helps and loves me everyday. So I want to help others. Jesus said:“Give to the one who asks you, and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you.” Matthew 5:42

lender.name: French Private Finance
lender.loan_because: it is good to give back and support those who want to improve their lives.

lender.name: W. Denis Nurmela
lender.loan_because: It feels good to do good!
lender.occupational_info: I have run my own businesses for years and now write and teach others how to grow their businesses.

lender.name: Perry
lender.loan_because: I can. Kiva is not a hand-out, but a hand up and who hasn't needed that at some stage in their life? We are so fortunate yet too often we forget how hard others have life. These people are taking action to make change happen. You have to respect that.
lender.occupational_info: I write and teach about personal safety and offer advice for westerners wishing to retire to third world countries.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because:
I want to help empower others.
I don't believe in a God, or Gods. I think altruism is a natural (evolved) human instinct.
Peace :-)
lender.occupational_info: Boring office job, but I can wears shorts and a T-shirt. Flexible hours, but still pretty much Monday-Friday 9-6. I write software as part of the development of new mobile phone technology.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I prosecute crimes committed against the laws of the State of Illinois.

lender.name: AJ Arora
lender.loan_because: Every man deserves the rights we consider inalienable.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage products at Yahoo!, and for non-profits helping to provide education in Cambodia and other developing countries.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I know people that have gone on mission trips to developing nations mainly to do Orthotic and Prosthetic work. I've seen the pictures of what they have accomplished, and though i can't afford to go on such a trip I can afford to lend a little to Kiva's cause.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an orthotic and prosthetic company, I keep all the computer, phone, CAD and CAM systems in working order.

lender.name: Jann
lender.loan_because: it is one thing I can do to try and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I had to retire from teaching because of severe arthritis. There is not a lot I can do to physically help others, so it's good to know that I can at least help by loaning money for a good cause.

lender.name: Julianna
lender.loan_because: Il me rend joyeux d'aider les autres!

lender.name: Augusto Jacquier
lender.loan_because: I want to, because it's important, because I can.

lender.name: Vinnie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Tom Morley
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: A future doctor with a passion for global health and sustainable living.

lender.name: Joakim
lender.loan_because: I can...
lender.occupational_info: I try to get by too.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for everything Jehovah has given me and my family.

lender.name: Rise
lender.loan_because: Hello and welcome to Rise. Our London based agency offers a full complement of search marketing services, ensuring your website receives all the attention it deserves.

lender.name: Yeweng
lender.loan_because: Helping people rocks!

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I would like it if people would do the same for me. Helping struggling people is a great way to make a difference.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Cooperative efforts and people helping people with a hand up not a hand out. Kiva fit into my plan as an example of how people can start a small philanthropic effort. Contact me on Face Book or 140 Cooperative Network.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because:
"Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow." (from "The Matchmaker")
--Thornton Wilder

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: i ring up food at Kroger.

lender.name: "Sun...,Pum...& Lov..."
lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity to share God's love with others.
lender.occupational_info: food service

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: I was born and raised in Peru, I have seen the daily struggle that many people experience and I appreciate efforts like this that allow people in country's like mine lift themselves out of bad situations.
lender.occupational_info: Estudio, estudio, estudio. :)

lender.name: Garrick
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sierra
lender.loan_because: I feel everything I do will gome back to me ten fold. I also loan because I feel it's the right thing to do rather I can afford it or not
lender.occupational_info: We help girls to look at themselves and see beauty on the inside and outside by providing free hair styling and monthly feild trips to age apropriate and girl uplifting places in ouy hometown and once a year we leave our city to take a feild trip out of town.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: small business feed families and build communities.
lender.occupational_info: Just like you, I try to find more people who want my goods and services, so my business will grow.

lender.name: Joe
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of helping lead an organization that is focused on caring for the widows, orphans and the "least of these". We have ministries in Mexico and in Kenya. We feed impoverished and orphan children as well as adults. Our feeding program meets a basic need and earns us the opportunity to share the transforming message of the gospel of Jesus Christ. In addition we have an orphanage in Kenya and an outreach center in Mexico that are focused on investing and pouring into the lives of the next generation in an effort to raise up Christian leaders. It is the most rewarding and humbling experience and I get to call it my job everyday.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping those who want to help themselves. My wife and I have worked hard at our business and appreciate others who are trying to do the same. God has blessed us in so many ways and our prayer is that he could use us to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: Running a small restaurant that sells mainly IceCream.

lender.name: Rochelle,Porky & James
lender.loan_because: Every little helps especially in the case of the poor. Its the right thing to do and it makes me (& my handpuppet Porky) feel that I am contributing in my own little way.
lender.occupational_info: Lots of writing, research and brainwork (and travel to the tropics, if I have my way). :)

lender.name: ALEYNE
lender.loan_because: we are all connected

lender.name: Sigrid
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I understand that micro finance can lead to macro results.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work in the entertainment industry of film and television as a background actor. Fun times! I am a retired high school and community college English teacher.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I believe that there are great people in the world that should be given the same opportunities that I have been given.

lender.name: Cristi and Darleen
lender.loan_because: Every little bit counts!

lender.name: BARBARA
lender.loan_because: I love to see someones dream come true to be self sufficent and so people see what can happen if they believe and have faith always and I hope one day poverty will end

lender.name: neo
lender.occupational_info: Our mission at NeoVision Eye Center is to help you "See Beyond Your Imagination." Whether you require LASIK surgery, cataract removal, or simply glasses or contacts, we always strive to provide you the highest level of personal care. Our staff is both professional and friendly to make your visit pleasant to bring you back again and again for all of your eye care needs. Quality patient care is always a priority at NeoVision Eye Center. Come join our family!

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born in a society that provided me with a fair opportunity to achieve what I want and ensures my basic financial well-being. Everyone deserves an opportunity.

lender.name: lynnmiller
lender.occupational_info:
LMA, LLC - YOUR #1 BUSINESS RESOURCE!
LYNN MILLER ASSOCIATES, LLC *Professionalism with a Flair!* EXECUTIVE BUSINESS SYSTEMS DEVELOPMENT & CONSULTATION
Just imagine tapping into a Network of Executive Business Development Consultants, C-Level Administrators and Professional Marketers with years of experience and multiple proven successes in international businesses, equipped with direct access to high level information & technology, all dedicated to bringing you & your brand to a world wide level of focus. Now envision sitting on the beach sipping a beverage while monitoring your global marketing network gains on your Laptop or iPhone, or lying in bed waking to daily reports of rapidly increasing ROI’s on your BlackBerry.
With LMA as your Business Partner, you will experience the ease and comfort of No Stress Business Planning, Processing & Marketing. We can take you from Administrative Overload to Operational Excellence, from a Project Proposal to an In-Depth Global Business Plan, from a Corporate Website to an Internationally Renowned Web Presence, from Social Networking to Worldwide Social Media Branding & Marketing.
How may we help you?
*CONTACT US TODAY: PHONE: 718-506-2329 -- EMAIL: info@lmallc.com -- WEBSITE: www.lmallc.com
LMA, LLC Network Brief: Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/lmallc Facebook: http://companies.to/lynn.miller.associates LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/lmallc Blogsite: http://lmallc.posterous.com SNG Showcase: http://www.socialnetgate.com/showcase/LMALLC

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: Just doing what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help computer communicate around the world.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed. Realizing something that seems so small, something I could easily take for granted, will go so far in other parts of the world is truly humbling.

lender.name: Late Late
lender.occupational_info: We list 270+ online gift shops that offer next day delivery, same day delivery and instant delivery gifts. We’ll tell you what they sell, what fast delivery costs – and what time to order by to guarantee delivery!

lender.name: Stovall
lender.loan_because: Not because I care, we all care, not because i want to see a profit, because we all want profit. but because i can and they can not.
lender.occupational_info: It is not the work you do, it is how well it is done.

lender.name: Protica
lender.occupational_info: Founded in 2001, Protica, Inc. (Protica Research http://www.protica.com) is a nutritional research firm specializing in the development of capsulized foods (dense nutrition in compact liquid and food forms). Protica manufactures Profect, IsoMetric, Pediagro, Fruitasia and more than 100 other brands in its GMP-certified, 250,000 square foot facility. One area of specialty is the manufacturing of Medicare-approved, whey liquid protein drinks for weight loss patients.

lender.name: Sylvie
lender.loan_because: we all depend each other. Even when we forget it !
lender.occupational_info: I endeavour to help people in companies to develop their skills, their efficency and their well-being

lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Wanda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Romkey family
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Thomas Lyte is a modern, ethical, English luxury goods brand with an obsession for fine craftsmanship. Working with the finest leather and silver, the collection is a mix of original and elegant quality accessories and luxury gifts.
lender.occupational_info: Thomas Lyte is a modern, ethical, English luxury goods brand with an obsession for fine craftsmanship. Working with the finest leather and silver, the collection is a mix of original and elegant quality accessories and luxury gifts.

lender.name: George Hoeppner
lender.loan_because: I wish to support our neighbor, Mexico
lender.occupational_info: I am retired

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: i have family living in poverty overseas and i know the deep feeling of offense when you belittle a person because you have more money than them. By giving a person a loan, you recognize that they too are accountable, smart, responsible, and capable of success just like you... they just need the resources you have to make that possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am an electrical engineer - consulting and testing power systems for different facilities.

lender.name: Mari
lender.loan_because: It's one world.
lender.occupational_info: Assistant to attorneys in the areas of intellectual property: patents, trademarks and copyrights.

lender.name: brendan
lender.loan_because: i'm self employed and i know what it takes to get money

lender.name: Naseem
lender.occupational_info: im Naseem , live in karachi. im a medical person, and working for the children health & eduation care.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I have so much compared to what others have, and it's time to share the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I build computer networks around the world.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I lived in Central America for a few years and saw the big impact small investments can have on ordinary lives. Students learn about the principles, raise the money, and watch their investments in humanity and the global economy grow!

lender.loan_because: To enrich the lives of ordinary people in wherever they happen to be..

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: the world needs more kindness.

lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Adriaan
lender.loan_because: it's a moral obligation to help the less fortunate if you can.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: If I were in someone else's shoes I would want someone to give me the same opportunity my loans give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in government. I answer the phones and meet with voters and people who have problems dealing with the government.

lender.name: david and your cat
lender.loan_because: the things we have not been divided in a fair and this is clear ... it's up to us to restore some justice ...
lender.occupational_info: working in the warehouse of a large furniture factory in central Italy, in my country as in others the crisis is doing much damage but never indifference does damage in the world, I am lucky to work again and I want to share this good fortune with someone.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: I work for a greek tourist company in italy.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because:
Eva gave me a gift certificate.
I want every person in the world to be as financially independent as possible and as happy as possible. I like being part of something good.
Kiva is a non-profit organization helping people to create opportunities for themselves and does not partner with anyone who tries to make a profit by exploiting the poor. It does not exclude any person trying to start a business because of age, nationality, religious or political beliefs, gender, HIV status or other things irrelevant when looking at the need or ability to run a business and build a home.
nice video on Kiva activity: http://vimeo.com/28413747
always helpful in international teams: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html
I just signed a petition to ask Russian leaders not to make it illegal to mention LGBT in books, articles or just talking. Please join me! http://www.allout.org/en/actions/russia_silenced/taf
And don`t forget to be awesome: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FyQi79aYfxU
lender.occupational_info:
I help that the things our customers want delivered get to their customers.
Tradition is to preserve the fire and not to pray to the ashes. (Gustav Mahler)
As Munich is a partner city of Harare, the capital of Zimbabwe, I am delighted that Kiva found a field partner in Zimbabwe, too.

lender.name: Harrison
lender.loan_because: The world can become better with more satisfied people living on it.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the internet to help people connect with each other and find what they want with ease and pleasure.

lender.name: claudia
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: retail

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I feel that there are worth causes that need help getting off the ground. That is what made the U.S.A., great. People taking risks on other people, and I want to spread that through out the world
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer software. For those of you that use a computer or phone you may ore may not have used some software that I have written.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and I want to help others get one too.
lender.occupational_info: I DON'T ! And it's WONDERFUL!!!

lender.name: Bianca from Holland
lender.loan_because: It's wonderfull to help so directly!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that finds jobs for people with a psycological or fysical handicap

lender.name: Sheri
lender.occupational_info:
I have a small business with a physician. We are a public service business and provide help to a lot of people through our work in evaluating medical science, in training others to do so and in helping people improve clinical care.
We do a lot of volunteer work through our business directly and are grateful for more opportunities to help in other ways such as through Kiva.

lender.name: vivian
lender.loan_because: Hopefully i want to expand my business from sari sari store to grocery store.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: funds allow people to put their ideas into reality.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to lend a helping hand to others so that they have the opportunity to succeed in their dream of entrepreneuership and creating greater success and contribution in their families and their communities, while at the same time allowing them the means for developing the self esteem tied to making a business successful.
lender.occupational_info: My occupation allows me to help others build and implement their business and sales plans. I enjoy hiking, biking, study and travel when I'm not working.

lender.name: Ferreira Family
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed with our family and health so we are paying it forward.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to see something you've contributed to become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist who makes paintings.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the selling of films. I am also a photographer.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: ultimately we are all global citizens; lending money seems a great way for me to help people in developing countries reach their financial goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a high school counseling students on everything from personal issues, to course selection to career and college planning.
